name: Jacob's Room
description:
Your friend has invited you to hang out, but there isn't actually much to do at his place. Interact with items and talk to Jacob to learn more about him!

This is my first RPG Maker Game, made as a sort of practice to get used to the software. It's simple, mainly dialogue, and can be beaten in about 5 mins. I was originally just putting it here to share with friends, but I'm making it open to the public just for fun.

Controls are standard RPG Maker controls.

Arrow keys - move

Z - interact

X - cancel and open menu

Ctrl - skip dialogue 

That's basically all you'll need!

Also, if you're unsure of what to do at any point: just try talking to Jacob! And make sure you've interacted with everything.
